name: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
title: A timeless love story
description: The classic romance between Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy, exploring themes of love, class, and society.

name: The Notebook
author: Nicholas Sparks
title: A love that lasts forever
description: A touching story of enduring love between Noah and Allie, told through a notebook.

name: Outlander
author: Diana Gabaldon
title: Time-traveling romance
description: A historical romance about a WWII nurse who travels back in time to 18th century Scotland.

name: Me Before You
author: Jojo Moyes
title: A life-changing love
description: A poignant love story between a caregiver and a quadriplegic man that changes both their lives.

name: The Time Traveler's Wife
author: Audrey Niffenegger
title: Love across time
description: A unique love story about a man with a genetic disorder that causes him to time travel unpredictably.

name: It Ends with Us
author: Colleen Hoover
title: A powerful story of love and strength
description: A bold and unflinching novel about a woman torn between two loves and facing difficult choices.
